definition: Park Geun-hye (1952-), Korean politician, daughter of former dictator Park Chung-Hee 朴正熙[Piao2 Zheng4 xi1], president of Korea 2013-2017
surname Piao/Korean surname (Park, Pak, or Bak)/also pr. [Pu2]
Celtis sinensis var. japonica
plain and simple/Taiwan pr. [pu2]
Hibiscus syriacus/transient
surname Hui
favor/benefit/to bestow/(literary) benevolence/(honorific)

sentences.english: Na received support from another prominent female politician, Park Geun-hye.
sentences.chinese: 罗卿瑗得到了另外一位杰出的女政治家朴槿惠的支持。

sentences.english: Park is the first sitting president of South Korea to be accused by prosecutors of a criminal conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 朴槿惠是韩国首位被检方指控为共犯的在任总统。

sentences.english: Was also a lot about Park's message.
sentences.chinese: 当时也出现很多有关朴槿惠的留言。

sentences.english: Next, President Obama welcomes South Korean president Park Geun-Hye to the White House yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，奥巴马总统昨天在白宫迎接韩国总统朴槿惠。

sentences.english: The failure assassination dramatically changed the course of Park Geun-Hye's life.
sentences.chinese: 暗杀的失败极大地改变了朴槿惠的生活。

sentences.english: Park has stopped attending Cabinet and presidential staff meetings.
sentences.chinese: 朴槿惠已不再参加内阁和青瓦台工作会议。

sentences.english: South Korean President Park Geun-hye was impeached by the nation's National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 韩国总统朴槿惠被国民大会弹劾。

sentences.english: Tuesday, President Obama will receive South Korean President Park Geun-hye at the White House.
sentences.chinese: 周二，奥巴马总统将在白宫迎接韩国总统朴槿惠。
